Contact Related Information: The George Brown College Admissions Office can be reached at admissions@georgebrown.ca for domestic student queries, while international students should contact international recruitment representatives through booked virtual meetings or the International Contact Us page. Financial aid inquiries should be directed to FinAid@georgebrown.ca, and program-specific information can be obtained by scheduling an appointment with an Entry Advisor or contacting individual program coordinators like Saifur Rahman at mdsaifur.rahman@georgebrown.ca for the Project Management (B415) program. Additionally, the Centre for Business can be contacted at business@georgebrown.ca or (416) 415-5000 ext. 2160. International recruitment representatives are also available on Instagram and LinkedIn.
